tool_description: Retrieve LinkedIn data associated with a given email address. If the email corresponds to a LinkedIn user, the API returns information such as the user's name, profile photo, occupation, educational background, and work history.

api_list.name: Search by Email
api_list.description: Submit an email address to obtain LinkedIn data if the user is found on the platform.

required_parameters.name: email
required_parameters.description: The email address to search for on LinkedIn.
